meta.job_title: iCIMS Talent Cloud Platform Implementation Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the implementation process of iCIMS Talent Cloud platform for new and existing customers, ensuring the complete solution is delivered on time.
Configure customer's instance of the product based on the information gathered during the sales and requirements gathering process, ensuring alignment with customer goals.
Support the customer go-live process by configuring the platform, facilitating training sessions, and providing standard processes for adoption.
Solve issues through final resolution during customer launch and through the hypercare period, ensuring customer satisfaction.
Support a seamless handoff to the appropriate account team(s) after the hypercare period.
Become an iCIMS certified technical expert in all related products.
Ensure overall customer success including an effective sales handoff, project planning, status reporting, multi-functional accountability, and customer training through best practice consultation.
Explain system-to-system integrations and conduct software training sessions to help customers synthesize complex technical information and user adoption.
Support customers in researching business processes, diagnosing and resolving on-demand (web-based) software issues.
Prioritize competing requests from customers, partnering internally with key collaborators to ensure success.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
